remarks: Function returning all the faithful functors from a category ` C ` to a category ` D ` .  A full functor is a functor in which all the morphism maps ` G ( X , Y ) ` between objects ` X , Y e. C ` are injections. Definition 3.27(2) in [Adamek] p. 34.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
statement:
df-fth $p |- Faith = ( c e. Cat , d e. Cat |-> { <. f , g >. | ( f ( c Func d ) g /\ A. x e. ( Base ` c ) A. y e. ( Base ` c ) Fun `' ( x g y ) ) } ) $.
$d c d f g x y $.
